The claim is that Hillary Clinton: s 2008 campaign and her supporters were responsible for starting the birther movement.
The expert: s verdict states that there is no evidence linking Clinton or her official campaign to starting the birther movement.
Factcheck: org also confirmed that no journalist found a connection to anyone in the Clinton camp regarding the birther movement.
However: it is acknowledged that Clinton supporters, including Linda Starr, played a role in spreading the birther movement through anonymous emails and collaboration with lawyer Philip Berg.
